item.title: SORN van parked long-term in residential bay., 17th June
item.description:
A white Ford Transit van (registration NE53 UKO) has been parked in a shared residential car park on Fleming Way, SE28 8NS, for several moths without moving. I have checked online, and the vehicle is declared as SORN with DVLA, which means it should not be parked on public or shared land. The vehicle is taking up a valuable parking space and does not appear to be in use. Please could this be investigated and removed if appropriate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hodgkins Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General litter/ overgrown weeds, 17th June
item.description:
The pathway could do with a general litter pick as it’s not attended often enough and is really unpleasant for local residents to look at. Additionally, could we please have the path weeded as they are so overgrown that the steps are being covered becoming a trip hazzard to those less able. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Domonic Drive, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: No Lane Markings and Worn Out Markings, 17th June
item.description:
This slip road and junction is very dangerous where it changes from 2 lanes to 3 lanes, as it also has multiple turns available before proceeding onto the A102 proper. There is no signage and no clear lane markings indicating which lanes are for ahead or for which turn--the first or the second. As there are multiple right turns consecutively, I have witnessed multiple near collisions as vehicles do not have clear guidance on what lane they should join when proceeding from the light, heading northward or which lane they should use for turning. Please address this as urgently as possible, as it is a safety issue. Thank you for your time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
